name: market for intermodal shipping container, 40-foot, high-cube | intermodal shipping container, 40-foot, high-cube | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/14404/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'intermodal shipping container, 40-foot, high-cube', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This product is a mobile infrastructure that is used in the service of transportation. This intermodal shipping container represents the infrastructure used to store and transport goods. Its cargo capacity is 2 TEU and its maximum gross weight is 30480 kg. It has a lifetime capacity of 724610000 kg*day and a lifetime of 15 years.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'intermodal shipping container, 40-foot, high-cube',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'intermodal shipping container, 40-foot, high-cube',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.

exchanges.description:
Standard 40-food, high-cube intermodal shipping container. 

External dimensions; length - 12.192 m, width - 2.438 m and height - 2.896 m.
Interior dimensions: length - 12.000 m, width - 2.311 m and height - 2.2.650 m.
Internal volume: 75.3 m3
Maximum gross weight: 30.848 tons
Empty weight: 3.9 tons
Net load: 26.58 tons
